summary: A con-artist hires two low-lifes to cover him during a deal, ending with three criminals, two dueling pistols, and one night they'll never forget.
cast: Vincent D'Onofrio|Matthew Lillard|Valeria Golino|Mark Boone Junior|Tamara Mello|Michael Shamus Wiles|J.W. Smith|Ed O'Ross|George Griffith|Dennis Keiffer|David Glen Eisley|Rhino Michaels|Sam Hiona|Dale 'Mad Dog' Messmer
title: Spanish Judges
